section_title: PROVISION OF FINANCIAL AND TECHNICAL SUPPORT
sentences: In the SBI Plenary on Friday, 6 June, the GEF reported on the outcomes of its May 2003 Council meeting, highlighting relevant decisions regarding its support for national communications from non-Annex I Parties.
Several Parties underscored the need for the timely disbursement of financial resources, and for holding regional and subregional workshops on guidelines for the second national communications.
SBI Chair Stoycheva said she would prepare draft conclusions on this issue.
On Friday, 13 June, the SBI adopted the draft conclusions.
